customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only works well, but it smells FANTASTIC! I wish this company made body wash because I wish I could smell like it all the time! But as far as the shampoo goes, it cleans and lathers very well! I bought it because I asked my hairstylist what she used to make my hair look and smell so good and she said this, along with the kenra blonde conditioner, was what she swears by!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Weiser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set because I am on the keto diet and my hair was thinning. This has made a huge difference!! I am also fragrance sensitive due to migraines- this has a nice fragrance and it does not give me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Y I K E S
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this shampoo and conditioner. The conditioner is definitely the worse of the two. It makes my hair waxy, matted, and tangled. It's effective in that it gives my flat, straight hair volume, but not at a cost I'm willing to pay. I'm going to keep dealing with it until my upcoming salon visit and will purchase new product then.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Save the money, greasy mess
customer_reviews.text: Honestly.. I love the Amika signature shampoo but this volume plus thickening shampoo was awful! It did not wash out of my hair at all, once my hair would dry there would be awful greasy waxy build up on my hair. I couldn’t run my fingers through my hair without them needing to be washed after cause they were so oily. My hair wouldn’t even last a day without looking like it needed washed and normally hair lasts about 4 days. If I could return this product and get a refund I would be happy but unfortunately it’s past the window. Save your money, it doesn’t thicken or give volume, just weighs it down with grease.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Showalter

product_meta.title: amika 3D Volume Plus Thickening Shampoo
product_meta.description:
Size:1000ml/33.8 Ounce3D Volume and Thickening Shampoo contains Redensyl–patented blend of ingredients that promote hair growth by stimulating regeneration in the hair follicles and reducing hair loss. Hydrolyzed Rice Protein–a rich, gluten-free, vegetable protein. Improves hair volume + manageability, while providing thickness and natural shine to hair. Naturally rich in Amino Acids. Contributes to a thicker look and feel. Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein–tiny molecules that are able to penetrate hair to thicken, volumize, lightly moisturize and make hair more pliable from the inside-out. Sea Buckthorn Oil (the Super Fruit)–rich in vitamin C and A, antioxidants and healthy omega fatty acids, including the essential omega-7.

BRAND STORY
professional haircare + tools for a lifestyle of self-expression and hair rebellion against conformity and the mundane.
